com.esri.mo2.ui.toc
Class DataFrameNode

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.ui.toc.DataFrameNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, DataFrame, MutableTreeNode, Serializable, TreeNode
public class DataFrameNode
extends DefaultMutableTreeNode
implements DataFrame

A DataFrameNode presents a certain of geographic region under a projection with a group of layers in the Map. It works as a top-level layer container in a TreeToc. It may have zero or many LegendNode(s).

See Also:
Serialized Form
